DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Dr.Reddy 's Ibuprofen Diphenhydramine Citrate 200 mg/38 mg Caplets Under Fed Condition
DOC.detailed_description: Detailed Description : The study conduct Open label , balance , randomize , two-treatment , two-sequence , two period , single-dose , crossover oral bioequivalence study Ibuprofen Diphenhydramine citrate 200 mg/38 mg caplets Dr. Reddy 's Laboratories Limited , India Advil @ PM , Wyeth Consumer Healthcare , USA. , normal , healthy , adult , human subject feed condition . A total number forty ( 40 ) subject enrol study subject complete period study .
DOC.criteria: Healthy human subject age 18 45 year ( include ) . Subjects BMI 18.5 24.9 Kg/m2 ( include ) body weight less 45 Kgs . Subjects normal health determine personal medical history , clinical examination , laboratory examination include serological test . Subjects normal 12 lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Subjects normal chest XRay ( P/A view ) . Subjects able communicate effectively . Subjects willing give write informed consent adhere requirement protocol . Female subject postmenopausal surgically sterile . Female subject practice acceptable method birth control duration study judge investigator ( ) , condom , foam , jelly , diaphragm , intrauterine device ( IUD ) abstinence . Subjects contraindication hypersensitivity Ibuprofen Diphenhydramine citrate relate group drug . History presence medical condition disease accord opinion physician . History presence significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunological , dermatological , neurological psychiatric disease disorder . History presence significant alcoholism drug abuse past one year . History presence significant smoking ( 10 cigarette bidis/day consumption tobacco product ) . Difficulty donate blood . Difficulty swallow solid like tablet capsule . Systolic blood pressure le 90 mm Hg 140 mm Hg . Diastolic blood pressure le 60 mm Hg 90 mm Hg . Pulse rate le 50 beats/minute 100 beats/minute . Use prescribed medication last two week OTC medicinal product last one week precede first dosing . Major illness 3 month screen . Participation drug research study within past 3 month . Donation blood past 3 month screen . Female subject demonstrate positive pregnancy screen . Female subject currently breastfeed . Female subject child bear potential use prohibit contraceptive method ( Oral , Injectable Implantable hormonal agent ) .
